channel.title: Openai.com/Blog on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Openai.com/Blog on .NET Ramblings

item.title: OpenAI partners with Cerebras
item.description: OpenAI partners with Cerebras to add 750MW of high-speed AI compute, reducing inference latency and making ChatGPT faster for real-time AI workloads. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/cerebras-partnership

item.title: OpenAI and SoftBank Group partner with SB Energy
item.description: OpenAI and SoftBank Group partner with SB Energy to develop multi-gigawatt AI data center campuses, including a 1.2 GW Texas facility supporting the Stargate initiative. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/stargate-sb-energy-partnership

item.title: Datadog uses Codex for system-level code review
item.description: OpenAI and Datadog brand graphic with the OpenAI wordmark on the left, the Datadog logo on the right, and a central abstract brown fur-like texture panel on a white background. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/datadog

item.title: Netomi’s lessons for scaling agentic systems into the enterprise
item.description: How Netomi scales enterprise AI agents using GPT-4.1 and GPT-5.2—combining concurrency, governance, and multi-step reasoning for reliable production workflows. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/netomi

item.title: OpenAI for Healthcare
item.description: OpenAI for Healthcare enables secure, enterprise-grade AI that supports HIPAA compliance—reducing administrative burden and supporting clinical workflows. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/openai-for-healthcare

item.title: How Tolan builds voice-first AI with GPT-5.1
item.description: Tolan built a voice-first AI companion with GPT-5.1, combining low-latency responses, real-time context reconstruction, and memory-driven personalities for natural conversations. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/tolan

item.title: Introducing ChatGPT Health
item.description: ChatGPT Health is a dedicated experience that securely connects your health data and apps, with privacy protections and a physician-informed design. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/introducing-chatgpt-health
